title: Hope this works.....
body: Hope this works.... How does one get to help make things in League ?

replies.body: Hey Storm, are you looking to [create skins and concepts](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) or are you looking to test new changes like in the [PBE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) and give good feedback to the community?
Well, I would love to help out with whatever i can help with.  I mainly just want to do my part in league, it doesnt matter where. Have a good day.
I think you have to be in the PBE, but it is hard to get into, you have to be a very experienced player with a very high ranking.
This is incorrect. We don't require anyone to be highly ranked to get PBE access, as that wouldn't be fair, and it wouldn't give us the best opportunity to test things.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq

If that is up to date.
